cosmos.question: I am the closest star to Earth. I give light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I rise in the morning.
🔥 I am very hot!
😎 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I orbit Earth and light up the night sky. I have phases. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I can be full or crescent.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 Some say I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that shines brightly. There are many of me in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🔭 You need a telescope to see some of me well.
🌟 I am like a distant sun.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, known for my rusty color. Scientists are looking for signs of life on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My color is like chocolate sometimes.
🚀 Rovers explore me.
🔴 I am named after a god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🥛 Ours is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a huge ball of gas, mostly hydrogen and helium, where nuclear fusion happens. I am much bigger than any planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I produce a lot of energy.
☀️ Our sun is one of me.
⭐ I am a star.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that appear to form a pattern in the sky. People use me to navigate. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is an example.
🗺️ Sailors used to use me.
🌠 I can look like animals or people.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky body orbiting the Sun. Most of me are found between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am smaller than a planet.
💥 Some of me can hit Earth.
🪨 I am a space rock.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that orbits the Sun in a long, oval-shaped path. I develop a tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am a dirty snowball.
💫 I can be seen from Earth periodically.
✨ I have a bright tail that points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a region in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible.
🕳️ I suck everything in.
🌀 I am formed from collapsed stars

food.question: I am yellow and curved, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I'm longer than an inch.
🌳 I grow on trees.
💛 My color is similar to the sun.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow, and you can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often served cold.
🦴 I help you grow strong bones.
🐄 Cows make me.

food.question: I am red, round, and juicy, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a fruit.
🥧 I can be used in pies.
💚 Some kinds are green.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
✨ I'm known to help your eyesight.
🐇 Bunnies enjoy me.

food.question: I am made of dough, and I am baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I come in many shapes and sizes.
🥪 I am often used to make a quick lunch.
🌾 I am made from wheat.

food.question: I am a vegetable with many layers. People sometimes cry when they cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
😭 I can make you cry.
🍽️ I am often used when cooking.

food.question: I am a frozen treat that comes in many flavors. I am often served in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am very cold.
👅 I'm sweet and creamy.
☀️ You usually eat me when the weather is warm.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can be made into juice.
🍷 I can be made into wine (but you can't drink that yet!).
🌱 I grow on vines.

food.question: I am a grain that is often served with chicken or vegetables. I can be white or brown. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 Many people eat me in Asia.
🥘 I can be cooked in a pot.
🌱 I am a seed of a grass plant.

food.question: I am a type of nut that is used to make a spread, which is often put on bread with jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 Squirrels love me.
🥪 I taste great in a sandwich.
🍫 Some people love me with chocolate.
